title: gesisdata: Reproducible Retrieval of GESIS Data Archive Datasets
text: gesis_download function (1) simulates visit GESIS log-page, (2) enters required information sign , (3) navigates specified dataset downloads dataset’s files, , optionally default, (4) converts dataset’s Stata-formated files .Rdata format. Datasets specified using file_id argument. GESIS uses unique number identify datasets. number consistently appears alongside dataset’s name; also listed “Study Number,” can found end dataset’s URL well. cumulative Politbarometer, example, file id ZA5100:  reproducibly download dataset: Multiple datasets may downloaded research area single command passing vector ids file_id. following downloads Politbarometer cumulative file along Eurobarometer 84.4 ISSP Role Government V: needed datasets (, available, codebooks) downloaded, datasets default converted .RData format ready loaded R using load() rio::import().
code: gesis_download(file_id = "ZA5100",                download_dir = tempdir()) # remember to specify a directory for your download gesis_download(file_id = c("ZA5100", "ZA6644", "ZA6900"),                download_dir = tempdir()) # remember to specify a directory for your download politbarometer <- rio::import(file.path(tempdir(), "ZA5100", "ZA55100_v2-0-0.RData"))

what: Reproducible Data Retrieval from the GESIS Data Archive
title: Reproducible Data Retrieval from the GESIS Data Archive
text: GESIS Data Archive makes available thousands invaluable social scientific surveys, including, among many others, ALLBUS, European Values Survey, Eurobarometer, International Social Survey Program. Researchers taking advantage datasets, however, caught bind. archive’s terms conditions bar dissemination downloaded datasets third parties. ensure one’s work can reproduced, assessed, built upon others, one must provide access raw data one employed. gesisdata package cuts knot providing programmatic, reproducible access specified GESIS datasets within R registered users. install: latest released version: install.packages("gesisdata") latest development version: details, check vignette. Please recall using GESIS Data Archive, accept terms conditions.

what: Download datasets from the GESIS data archive — gesis_download
title: Download datasets from the GESIS data archive — gesis_download
text: gesis_download provides programmatic reproducible means download datasets    GESIS data archive

title: Download datasets from the GESIS data archive — gesis_download
code: gesis_download(   file_id,   email = getOption("gesis_email"),   password = getOption("gesis_password"),   use = getOption("gesis_use"),   reset = FALSE,   download_dir = "gesis_data",   msg = TRUE,   convert = TRUE,   delay = 5 )

title: Download datasets from the GESIS data archive — gesis_download
text: file_id unique identifier (optionally vector identifiers). dataset(s) downloaded (see details). email, password GESIS email password (see details). use number 'use data' (see details). reset TRUE, asked re-enter username, password, use. download_dir directory (relative working directory) files GESIS data archive downloaded. msg TRUE, outputs message showing data set downloaded. convert TRUE, converts downloaded file(s) .RData format. delay speed connection GESIS data archive particularly slow,  gesis_download may encounter problems.  Increasing delay parameter may help.

title: Download datasets from the GESIS data archive — gesis_download
